items.title: Russia attacks Ukraine with dozens of drones ahead of Trump-Zelenskyy meeting
items.description: Russia launched dozens of drones into Ukraine overnight as Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy prepared to meet U.S. President Donald Trump.

items.title: Foods with healthy-sounding buzzwords could be hiding added sugar in plain sight
items.description: People probably don’t know how much sugar they’re eating

items.title: WATCH:  New Year’s resolutions for your pets
items.description: Veterinarian Adam Christman is here with some tips for pet lovers who are looking to level up their pet care for the new year.

items.title: Winter weather hits Northeast as new storm system moves across country
items.description: The New York City area accumulated just above 4 inches of snow as difficult travel conditions are expected through Saturday while crews work to clean ...

items.title: WATCH:  New York City subway MetroCard to be retired
items.description: The iconic card was swiped by millions daily for the past 32 years and will be retired Dec. 31.
